text: I finished this game last week and what a ride it was. As a fan of Penumbra and Amnesia, I was excited to play the game but it was mainly because I was intrigued by what many people called the best story of the year it came out. I was not disappointed, this is the kind of story you think about for a while, it really hits you. Honestly, this might be my favorite Sci-fi story in a video game and I'm sure it would make for a great movie adaptation. Soma would have made my 2015 Top 3 for sure, greatly recommended!
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky Yeah, I definitely agree with you. I loved amnesia and penumbra as well, so I had high expectations for SOMA, and it still blew me out of the water.
author: Ave -

text: Everyone needs to play this. If you don't like survival horror there are mods to make it more of a walking simulator with no monsters. Just fucking play this. That is all.
